title: Registration of spatio-temporal point clouds of plants for ...
summary: This post describes an approach for registering time-series 3D point cloud data of plants, focusing on spatio-temporal point clouds and datasets for analyzing plant growth.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the post discusses "spatio-temporal point clouds" and "datasets", which are relevant to "Spatio Temporal" and "Contextual dataset". While not a statistical point process, "point clouds" are a form of spatial point data.
